title: Foundations of Managerial Accounting: Small-Group Tutorials Based on Cooperative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Emphasizes applying and analyzing core managerial accounting concepts through small-group collaborative learning in online settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core concepts of managerial accounting: cost accounting, budgeting, performance evaluation, decision analysis, and standard costing.
Learners can apply managerial accounting techniques to real-world business scenarios through small-group discussions and case studies.
Learners can complete formative assessment tasks based on peer feedback using collaboration tools at an 80% or higher completion rate.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
